%%{init: {
  'theme': 'base',
  'themeVariables': {
    'primaryColor': '#ffffff',
    'primaryTextColor': '#000000',

    'tertiaryTextColor': '#000000'
  }

flowchart TB

    subgraph "Farmer-Connect System"

        subgraph "--"
        A[User Login Request] --> B[Validate Credentials]
        B --> C{Valid?}
        C -->|Yes| D[Generate JWT Token]
        C -->|No| E[Return Error]
        D --> F[Set Session Cookie]
        F --> G[Return Success Response]

        H[Browse Seminars] --> I[Select Seminar]
        I --> J{User Authenticated?}
        J -->|No| K[Redirect to Authentication]
        J -->|Yes| L[Check Availability]
        L --> M{Slots Available?}
        M -->|Yes| N[Register User]
        M -->|No| O[Show Full Message]
        N --> P[Update Seminar Capacity]
        P --> Q[Send Confirmation]

        R[User Item Request] --> S[Check Item Availability]
        S --> T{Available?}
        T -->|Yes| U[Create Transaction]
        T -->|No| V[Notify Unavailable]
        U --> W[Admin Review Queue]
        W --> X{Admin Decision}
        X -->|Approve| Y[Update Item Status]
        X -->|Reject| Z[Notify Rejection]
        Y --> AA[Schedule Pickup]

        end
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
